title: Rules Guy: Can I Drop Outside the Trap if I Hit Into Standing Water?
headline: Rules Guy: Can I Drop Outside the Trap if I Hit Into Standing Water?
short_headline: Rules Guy: Can I Drop Outside the Trap if I Hit Into Standing Water?
page_title: Rules Guy Hit Into Standing Water In Trap
slug: Rules Guy: Can I Drop Outside the Trap if I Hit Into Standing Water?
body: The Golf Magazine Rules Guy is here to answer your stickiest questions. What happens if there's standing water inside a bunker — and your ball lands in it? Can you drop outside the trap entirely?
